body:

Snape: I want the love of my life back alive.
Dumbledore: Yeah, I have like twelve galleons.

summary: So I was reading the philosophers stone
title: So I was reading the philosophers stone
body: And I was wondering how Dumbledore knew about Neville’s showdown with Harry Ron and Hermione. Cause like, it happened in the common room? There was no one else around? And then I remembered: “I don’t need a cloak to become invisible” and OHMYGOD DUMBLEDORE WAS IN THAT ROOM and I now 100% believe that Dumbledore primarily uses his invisibility to hide around the school picking up gossip and waiting for drama to go down like: “Cho’s going to the ball with Cedric Diggory? Not accepted CHOxHARRY 4EVER”. “Romilda Vane’s trying to sneak Harry love potion? Oooh scandalous! I should do something about these illegal potion- ooor I could just let it pan out.” “Wait Harry has a hippogriff tattoo? Why didn’t I know about this? Did he get a tattoo and not tell me? Wait Ginny says it’s a dragon how does Ginny know are they a thing now Harry why don’t you tell me anything anymore?”

summary: Can you imagine if you were ever just casually holding your wand while like your friends were being stupid and you just roll...
body: Can you imagine if you were ever just casually holding your wand while like your friends were being stupid and you just roll your eyes at them and go, “Ridiculous,” but then you’ve accidentally turned said friends into Professor Snape wearing your grandmother’s clothes because you’re Neville Longbottom and inadvertently tried battling a Bogart

blog.name: bluthatesreader
blog.title: Fanfictions reviews
blog.description: my view on some fics I've read

summary: The Stirring Quidditch Practice, a harry potter fanfic | FanFiction
body:
3.The Stirring by Nilsia-Tengun

Harry Potter fanfiction ˜ Rated M ˜ Severus Snape/OC ˜ 24 chapters (WIP)

“Strange things are happening to Róisín, a final year Ravenclaw student. When told that she will be in danger if discovered by He-Who-Must-Not-Be-Named, everything gets a lot more complicated. And awkward. Will Severus Snape be the only one able to help? Rated M for language and sexual content.”

At first, I was afraid I would find out yet another fic about a Snape/OC pairing… I don’t like some ot them for personal reasons (badly made self inserts, plot holes, usual plot dynamics I would read a bunch of times…). Here, even thoguh you’d find some echoes to what you’d have read before; I promise that the author takes time to develop each character, to offer deep consensus and complex interactions. The character developments are well driven and interesting to read on. Curosity is at sake and I only want to read the following chapter to understand more, to know more about the situation.

To end up, the different holes that are offered in the magical world of JKR are well exploited here. I’m deeply interested in every magical beast, creature and magical effect that every fanfic author can provide in their texts.

If you’re interested in, click the link below and leave comments!

The Stirring Quidditch Practice, a harry potter fanfic | FanFiction

title: Hogwarts Houses: Types of Jokes
body:
Gryffindor: So many, many dad jokes like holy god. It's not even funny anymore, just plain out obnoxious and annoying.
Slytherin: The sort of jokes that they make cause people shivers. Their jokes range from dark to just plain out 'I wanna die'.
Ravenclaw: People expect them to say simple but funny jokes, but oh no. Under that smart and with they hide the dirtiest jokes that can make even McGonagall go red in the face. People expect Gryffindors to make jokes like these, but nope!
Hufflepuff: Intricate puns. The lengths they go to deliver their jokes are so far that half of the time you can't even tell that it is a joke.

blog.name: tomarrywritingprompts
blog.title: Tomarry/Harrymort Writing Prompts
blog.description: All Tomarry and Harrymort prompts and inspiration! Anyone is free to use these prompts for their work, and if you do make something, add a link in a reblog! I'll promo it!

summary: Prompt: Jekyll and Hyde au. The charming Doctor Riddle, an expert in chemistry, has just invented an elixir that transforms him...
body: Prompt: Jekyll and Hyde au. The charming Doctor Riddle, an expert in chemistry, has just invented an elixir that transforms him into a monstrous beast, Lord Voldemort. It only lasts for 30 minutes, but that is more than enough time to indulge in his dark desires.

blog.name: sweetlialia
blog.title: Lia
blog.description: Mostly HP but non exclusively // Huffelpuff and proud // sometimes I write but I mostly reblog

title: Cushion fight
body:
for @rose-grangerweasleyisbae. Hoping it would distract you from your exam stress. I’m sorry it’s pretty lame and Nothing is written correclty but i didn’t seem to be able to do better sorry… but if you forget all those, i think you can enjoy it a little bit <3


“Harry dear? I’m home.” Draco called out, taking off his coat and shoes. There wasn’t any need for calling anyway, their flat had only one room and he could hear Harry scratching papers from where he was standing. Habits were just hard to kill. “How was your day?” he inquired as he walked to his lover, sitting at their desk. From the slumpiness of his shoulders and the mess surrounding him -not only on the table but in an area of five feet- he was sure he could predict the answer.

“I’m never gonna make it… There are just too many things! How am I supposed to remember when to apply L5453 or be sure it’s okay to act on R6432?

-I don’t have a single clue about what you’re talking about, love.

-Legislation.

-Oh. Want some help?

-I want to die. And my baby I’m home kiss. Don’t you know a spell to help me?

-Help you die? I might know one, yes.

-You prat. Come on, kiss me.

-You drank my peach flavoured tea?” Draco asked when they broke apart. “You knew I was keeping it for when Mother visit us next Sunday!

-Your mother visits us on Sunday?!

-No. She’s in Bordeaux for the month. Why? You want to see her?

-Then who is visiting on Sunday?

-No one.

-What? You just said that

-Harry Harry Harry… I haven’t say anything yet, I just came home!

-You’re doing this on purpose, right?

-Doing what?

-I hate you.

-Really?

-Really.

-Prove it then. Cushion fight. The first one on the floor loses.

-How will it prove that I hate you?

-Cause if you love me, you’ll let me win.

-I take the blue one.”

Harry and Draco faced each other, a cushion in their right hand. At Draco count, they both bow before making three steps toward the wall before throwing their cushions. As their flat was tiny, Harry tried to throw his without making it land on their tea pot as Draco tried to avoid the lamp, but failed. Letting go of his own cushion to catch the lamp before it hit the ground, he found himself defenceless when his lover stole his weapon.

“You cheater!

-You dropped it! It’s mine now! Be prepared to lose, ferret!

-Oh you didn’t dare!

-Ferret!”

If he wanted war, he was going to have it, did Draco thought, trying to run toward the sofa without avoiding the cushion being thrown at him. But Harry jumped in front of it, stopping him from fetching another weapon.

“Scarred Malfoy?” did he ask, rising his cushion in the air.

“You wish.”

Draco felt the cushion hit his ribs but didn’t care : Harry’s arms weren’t on his way to the couch anymore. So he jumped and  took all the pillows in his arms.

“Who’s scarred now?” his smirk didn’t had enough time to vanish that Harry had already grab his legs, pulling him toward the floor.

“Harry, this isn’t fair!” he tried, digging his nails in the couch. “I can’t defend myself!

-Stop laughing then! Stop acting like a crawling and use your legs!

-I’m not going to hit you! Hey you’re undressing me!

-Not my fault! Stop crawling and your damn trousers might stay on your hips! Ouch! You said you weren’t going to hit me!

-You tickled my feet!

-You’re ticklish?

-No no no! Harry I’m not! Harry, please, Harry!

-Let go off the couch!

-Then I’ll lose!

-Your choice!

-You hate me you hate me!” Draco squeaked, finally releasing the sofa and falling on the floor. “I hate you.” He laughed, hitting him with a pillow which had followed him on his way down.

“Nah, you don’t.” Harry corrected, wiping the tears from his lover eyes.

“You’re right. I don’t. I love you.

-I love you too.” He whispered, kissing him tenderly before lying down, resting his head on his stomach.

“So tell me, when are you supposed to use R2649?

-You just came up with those numbers right?

-Right.

-R6432 is important because if”

-Help you die? I might know one, yes.

-You prat. Come on, kiss me.

-You drank my peach flavoured tea?” Draco asked when they broke apart. “You knew I was keeping it for when Mother visit us next Sunday!

-Your mother visits us on Sunday?!

-No. She’s in Bordeaux for the month. Why? You want to see her?

-Then who is visiting on Sunday?

-No one.

-What? You just said that

-Harry Harry Harry… I haven’t say anything yet, I just came home!

-You’re doing this on purpose, right?

-Doing what?

-I hate you.

-Really?

-Really.

-Prove it then. Cushion fight. The first one on the floor loses.

-How will it prove that I hate you?

-Cause if you love me, you’ll let me win.

-I take the blue one.”

Harry and Draco faced each other, a cushion in their right hand. At Draco count, they both bow before making three steps toward the wall before throwing their cushions. As their flat was tiny, Harry tried to throw his without making it land on their tea pot as Draco tried to avoid the lamp, but failed. Letting go of his own cushion to catch the lamp before it hit the ground, he found himself defenceless when his lover stole his weapon.

“You cheater!

-You dropped it! It’s mine now! Be prepared to lose, ferret!

-Oh you didn’t dare!

-Ferret!”

If he wanted war, he was going to have it, did Draco thought, trying to run toward the sofa without avoiding the cushion being thrown at him. But Harry jumped in front of it, stopping him from fetching another weapon.

“Scarred Malfoy?” did he ask, rising his cushion in the air.

“You wish.”

Draco felt the cushion hit his ribs but didn’t care : Harry’s arms weren’t on his way to the couch anymore. So he jumped and  took all the pillows in his arms.

“Who’s scarred now?” his smirk didn’t had enough time to vanish that Harry had already grab his legs, pulling him toward the floor.

“Harry, this isn’t fair!” he tried, digging his nails in the couch. “I can’t defend myself!

-Stop laughing then! Stop acting like a crawling and use your legs!

-I’m not going to hit you! Hey you’re undressing me!

-Not my fault! Stop crawling and your damn trousers might stay on your hips! Ouch! You said you weren’t going to hit me!

-You tickled my feet!

-You’re ticklish?

-No no no! Harry I’m not! Harry, please, Harry!

-Let go off the couch!

-Then I’ll lose!

-Your choice!

-You hate me you hate me!” Draco squeaked, finally releasing the sofa and falling on the floor. “I hate you.” He laughed, hitting him with a pillow which had followed him on his way down.

“Nah, you don’t.” Harry corrected, wiping the tears from his lover eyes.

“You’re right. I don’t. I love you.

-I love you too.” He whispered, kissing him tenderly before lying down, resting his head on his stomach.

“So tell me, when are you supposed to use R2649?

-You just came up with those numbers right?

-Right.

-R6432 is important because if”

trail.content_raw:
for @rose-grangerweasleyisbae. Hoping it would distract you from your exam stress. I’m sorry it’s pretty lame and Nothing is written correclty but i didn’t seem to be able to do better sorry… but if you forget all those, i think you can enjoy it a little bit <3


“Harry dear? I’m home.” Draco called out, taking off his coat and shoes. There wasn’t any need for calling anyway, their flat had only one room and he could hear Harry scratching papers from where he was standing. Habits were just hard to kill. “How was your day?” he inquired as he walked to his lover, sitting at their desk. From the slumpiness of his shoulders and the mess surrounding him -not only on the table but in an area of five feet- he was sure he could predict the answer.

“I’m never gonna make it… There are just too many things! How am I supposed to remember when to apply L5453 or be sure it’s okay to act on R6432?

blog.name: incorrect-marauders
blog.title: incorrect marauders quotes
blog.description: incorrect quotes (or are they totally correct?) said by moony, padfoot, wormtail, and prongs. lilykins, snivellus, and minnie make some appearances.

summary:
James: Sometimes we screw things up for the better.
Sirius: That's a good motto. We should use that.
body:
James: Sometimes we screw things up for the better.
Sirius: That's a good motto. We should use that.

summary: Une amie m'a dit hier que si j'étais tombée sur serpentard, c'était peut-être parce que je voulais grave m'éloigner des...
body:
Une amie m'a dit hier que si j'étais tombée sur serpentard, c'était peut-être parce que je voulais grave m'éloigner des Pouffsouffle et qu'inconsciemment je suis allée vers la maison opposée.

Après elle m'a dit que j'étais Gryffondor.

It often takes another Slytherin to interpret one Slytherin's use of sarcasm.

summary: “An apple a day keeps anyone away if you throw it hard enough.”
